resourceInfo.displayName: T. gondii GT1 contig sequence and annotation from Genbank
resourceInfo.description: Toxoplasma gondii GT1 sequence and annotation from Lis Caler at the J. Craig Venter Institute (JCVI).
Chromosome map generated by David Sibley for T. gondii ME49 strain was used as a template to creat T. gondii GT1 chromosomes. Chromosomes we assembled by the EuPathDB team using Mercator and MAVID.
